name: AddProjectCollaborator
description:
Add a collaborator to an organization project.

This tool adds a collaborator to a specified organization project and assigns a permission level. It requires the user to be an organization owner or a project admin.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project to which a collaborator is being added. This ID is required to specify the exact project for collaboration.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: collaborator_username
parameters.description: The GitHub username of the collaborator to be added to the project.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: collaborator_permission_level
parameters.description: The permission level to assign to the collaborator. Options are: 'read', 'write', or 'admin'.

value_schema.description: The permission to grant the collaborator.
